name: generate_a_face
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool facegen.
Tool description: Generation of faces by AI. (Occasionally, a neural network makes mistakes, which is why artifacts appear: an incorrectly bent pattern, a strange hair color, and so on.)
API description: Provides a link to download a face image generated by artificial intelligence.

```

Occasionally, a neural network makes mistakes, 
which is why artifacts appear: an incorrectly bent pattern, 
a strange hair color, and so on.
```

ai.description: The AI model identifier to be used for face generation.
